title: Dofus: Book 1 - Julith
occurrences: A Dofus is a dragon egg that offers unlimited power, to he who knows how to use it! Six exceptionally powerful ones are known as the "Primordial Dofus". For centuries, they have been the stakes of a merciless war between the cities of Bonta and Brakmar.
The Ivory Dofus and the Ebony Dofus.
And so when Julith, the Butcher of Brakmar, guardian of the Ebony Dofus, marched on Bonta...
Breaking the sacred bonds of marriage, she unleashed the power of the Ebony Dofus.
The Ivory Dofus was consumed and the Ebony Dofus broken.
Dofus Book I: Julith
The Ebony Dofus has been stolen!
- The Ebony Dofus has been stolen!
...Ebony Dofus has been stolen!
She took the Ebony Dofus, and nobody could stop her.
The Ebony Dofus! B-but then, Joris is in danger!
Calm down! That Dofus is no more than an empty shell.
Bakara... You have to get the Ivory Dofus, it's the only thing that can protect you from Julith...
When the two Dofus collided, the Ebony Dofus shattered,
Julith seeks to restore the Ebony Dofus' power by bringing back the dragon's soul.
Fortunately, we have a way to counter her, thanks to the Ivory Dofus.
But I thought it was destroyed when Jahash, uh... when... my father... smashed it against the Ebony Dofus?
Fine. Then let's find the Ivory Dofus quickly and rescue Lilotte.
Let's find the Ivory Dofus so we can save Lilotte.
So that's a Dofus? Well it's not very big.
Of course I know who you are! Because of this Dofus business, I never knew my parents!
Well, there's just one problem, folks: there's only ONE Dofus, and um... four of you.
You don't know what's right! That's why the Dofus didn't choose you!
I'm not the one who unleashed the Ebony Dofus on Bonta.
That Dofus knew his stuff, didn't he! He'd rather have a kid for a guardian!
Get back if you don't want to be struck by the Dofus!
One of those "innocents" stole the Ebony Dofus under my care to unleash it upon the city.
We must smash the Ivory Dofus against the Ebony Dofus like my father did ten years ago!
Rush to the Dofus and pass it here!
Any resemblance to existing characters in the video game DOFUS is purely intentional.
